testis.text: Working with Biplob Kumar Sutradhar on a machine learning NLP-based research paper was a pleasure. His dedication, curiosity, and attention to detail were impressive. Biplob and his team made significant contributions to the project and demonstrated a strong understanding of the concepts. I have no doubt that he will be successful in his future endeavors.
Biplob provided an extremely useful utility to my open source project enabling users flexible interactivity. This contribution was invaluable and is used in over 150 codebases!

Biplob is humble, supportive, very dedicated and passionate about his work. I've found his projects really interesting and unique, specially, DIU Speeder, BLC Auto Login and YT Subscription Transfer. He's a leading team player with good effective communication skill and helpful towards his peer.
To give me some words, you just need to add same object above without 'blank' key. Thank you
